patterns.name: Vercel Rate Limit Exceeded
patterns.solution: Wait for the reset time indicated in the error message or retry after 1 hour.

patterns.name: Vercel Authentication Failed
patterns.solution: Check VERCEL_TOKEN and ensuring it is valid. Verify project linking.

patterns.name: NOWPayments API Key Missing
patterns.solution: Add NOWPAYMENTS_API_KEY to secrets.json or environment variables.

patterns.name: Module Import Error
patterns.solution: Install the missing module using pip.
